original: intros n p H1 H2. unfold lt in H1. unfold not in H2. unfold lt. unfold div. assert (H3: p <> 0). { intros contra. apply H2. rewrite contra. apply div_of_0. apply H3. } assert (H4: p <> 0). { intros contra. apply H2. rewrite contra. apply div_of_0. apply H4. } apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply div_rem_spec1.
